titles.title: A resolution supporting the designation of September 13, 2022 as National Sepsis Day.
A resolution supporting the designation of September 13, 2022 as National Sepsis Day.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of September 13, 2022, as National Sepsis Day.
